resource_notes: Requires understanding of Jint library for JS execution within .NET.
alternative_approach: Could use another JS engine, but Jint is a hard requirement (REQ-FUNC-DTR-001).
risk_factors: Incorrectly handling data marshalling between .NET and JS.
mitigation_strategy: Code review by Lead Backend Engineer.

task_name: Integrate Sandbox Options into Jint Engine Configuration
resource_notes: Security-critical task. Requires deep knowledge of Jint's sandboxing options.
risk_factors: Misconfiguration could lead to sandbox escape vulnerabilities (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory security code review by Security Lead.

task_name: Research and POC for Monaco Editor Integration
resource_notes: Requires investigation into bundle size and lazy loading strategies.
alternative_approach: Consider CodeMirror as a fallback if Monaco proves too heavy.
risk_factors: Potential for significant increase in application bundle size, impacting load performance.
mitigation_strategy: Time-box the POC to 1 day. Evaluate lazy loading as part of the POC.

task_name: Implement Log Integrity and Retention Mechanisms
resource_notes: Compliance-critical task. Requires designing a tamper-evident logging mechanism.
alternative_approach: Use a write-only log sink or blockchain-style chained hashes.
risk_factors: Design may not meet SOC 2 / ISO 27001 audit requirements if not robust.
mitigation_strategy: Formal design review with a compliance expert or security architect.
